channel.title: Dark Praise || Pk Server || Death is not an option || Flawless Combat
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/WhjSW.png[/img][/CENTER] [font=times new roman][size=16pt]hello guys and welcome to my thread. This Server is going to be a Spawn/Eco meaning that you cant Spawn every item there is. You need to save up for the good items, + i am working on a money system that you need to buy everything with cash. There will be a PvP zone that i am working on at the moment, and wild, I am planning on making that you dont lose items if you die in the wilderness but you gain PvP drops so you can sell your items. Enough of the Explaining, I will throw some features at you :)[/size][/font]
[size=24pt][b]features[/b][/size]
[ul][li]Fixed some item prices[/li] [li]Fixed Lag bug[/li] [li]Added Vengeance - 90%[/li] [li]Added Curse Prayer Book - 85%[/li] [li]Better Combat - 80%[/li] [li]634 Item Cache - 100%[/li] [li]Lots of 711 + item's including Torva - 20%[/li] [li]Korasi Sword with full special attack - 80%[/li] [li]Kill Streak System - 25%[/li] [li]Will add more features soon[/li][/ul]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/xm4D9.png[/img][size=24pt][b]Melee[/b][/size]
[ul][li]Max Hit's Formula[/li] [li]Correct Requirements[/li] [li]Correct Accuracy Formula[/li] [li]Correct Animation's[/li][/ul]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/BN5YA.png[/img][B][size=24pt][b]Range[/b][/size]
[ul][li]Correct Requirements[/li] [li]Correct animation's[/li] [li]Correct Gfx[/li] [li]Perfect Accuracy Formula[/li][/ul]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/r37dP.png[/img][size=24pt][b]Magic[/b][/size]
[ul][li]Correct Requirements[/li] [li]Correct animation's[/li] [li]Correct Gfx[/li] [li]Perfect Accuracy Formula[/li] [li]Ancient Spell book[/li] [li]Modern Spell Book[/li] [li]Vengeance[/li] [li]Vengeance other[/li][/ul]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/vki0j.png[/img][size=24pt][b]Prayer[/b][/size]
[ul][li]Normal Prayer's[/li] [li]Ancient Curse prayer's[/li][/ul]
[size=24pt][b]Media[/b][/size] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/0zzJD.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/8kn48.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/uQj5G.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/L7xeh.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/yifxX.png[/img]

item.title: Dark Praise || Pk Server || Death is not an option || Flawless Combat
item.dc:creator: @Special_Air_Service Special Air Service
item.description:
@Special_Air_Service wrote:

[CENTER][/CENTER]
[font=times new roman][size=16pt]hello guys and welcome to my thread. This Server is going to be a Spawn/Eco meaning that you cant Spawn every item there is. You need to save up for the good items, + i am working on a money system that you need to buy everything with cash. There will be a PvP zone that i am working on at the moment, and wild, I am planning on making that you dont lose items if you die in the wilderness but you gain PvP drops so you can sell your items. Enough of the Explaining, I will throw some features at you :)[/size][/font]

[li]Fixed Lag bug[/li]
